script:
1). They haven't lowered the temperature, have they?
No, not as far as I know. 
I know. It's too hot in here.
Yes, that's what the forecast is.
2). Why don't you send an e-mail to the CEO?
The mail hasn't come yet.
Good idea. I think I will. 
Yes, I have an appointment.
3). Isn't this the train to Albuquerque?
No, we're headed for Santa Fe. 
No, I usually take a taxi.
Yes, the training began last week.
